amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds from allowing the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to enforce the creation of a new capacity zone in the Hudson Valley in New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the order entitled "Order Accepting Proposed Tariff Revisions and Establishing a Technical Conference" issued by FERC on Aug. 13, 2013.

action.text: Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Maloney, Sean.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Sean amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
